column5: Apply nowWith an International Management Master you work specifically on your previous business knowledge and qualify for a leading position in business. In addition to the business content, you will also choose your own individual focus.International Management theory & practice are closely interlinked in this master. The integrated practical phases offer you extensive opportunities to gain your own practical experience and prove yourself in various areas.View International Management
column7: As a state-recognized, non-profit university and private business school the ISM is solely financed by tuition fees.  - Per semester (EU / Non-EU): 5,700 Euro - Monthly payments are also possible
column9: 3 semesters plus 1 semester thesis full time
